description: Scott:  Remember the high school locker room?  Remember the aroma of young jocks fresh off the playing field hurrying to strip and head for the showers?  Beautiful young hard bodies - glistening from steam and sweat.   Remember the hot young jock who loved to show his lean body to the admiring eyes of the other guys?  You will remember someone like Scott - a strapping young boy whose good looks, smooth body and long thick cock are a sure turn on.  Scott has it all and shows it!
title: Open Season, Scene #04
